page.title: 03IMPROVING THE DEARNE AREA.
page.content: A big improvement in our area is to have more public toilets. When you need to go to the toilet, and you are in Goldthorpe shopping there are never any near so I think we ought to have more public toilets. Another big improvement would be a{sports centre } with a swimming pool and an indoor bowling green and a gymnastics club and other sports. The reason that we need a sports centre is because the nearest sport centres are Rotherham and Sheffield. I think that would make a big improvement in our area. I think we ought to have a{snooker club} for children because in pubs they will not let children on the snooker tables.
